text:
Producer-san
The mic for the live broadcast is here~
I've brought it into the storage, so check it later~

Oh, thank you very much.
You've been a great help...!

It's nothing~
I think we've got all the equipments we need now.

...Um
Sorry we spent so much of our budget this time...

I talked to the sound staff at the studio and
picked out some good ones, but they were all pricey.

Fufu, don't worry about it~
This is for the sake of for all our idols.

Oh yeah, I almost forgot about the most important thing~
Who will you ask to do the first stream?
I'm thinking of having Mano help out.
